revokeCertificate: THIS CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN <u>REVOKED</u> AND IS NO LONGER VALID
updatedCertificate: THIS CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN <u>UPDATED</u>. A NEW VERSION HAS BEEN CONSTITUTED AND <u>THIS VERSION IS NO LONGER VALID.</u>
SeeAmendmentHistory: See amendment history for more information.
referenceNumber: Reference number(s) to other internationally recognized certificate(s) of compliance that relate(s) to this permit
amendmentDescription: Provide a summary of the reason for the update of the record
issuingAuthorityResponsible: Issuing Authority (the authority responsible for issuing this permit)
detailsPermit: Details of the permit or its equivalent
title: Reference number of the permit or its equivalent
dateOfIssuance: Date of issuance of the permit or its equivalent
dateOfExpiry: Date of expiry of the permit or its equivalent
confirmationPIC: Confirmation that prior informed consent was obtained or granted
theProviderInfo: The provider (the person or entity that holds the right to grant access to the genetic resources in accordance with domestic legislation)
personEntity: Person or entity to whom prior informed consent was granted
picInformation: Additional information about the prior informed consent
additionalDocuments: Additional documents or links about the prior informed consent
matConfirmation: Confirmation that mutually agreed terms were established
matInformation: Additional information about the mutually agreed terms
matDocuments: Additional documents or links about the mutually agreed terms
subjectMatter: Subject-matter or genetic resources covered by the permit or its equivalent
usages: Type of use allowed by the permit or its equivalent
usagesConfidential: Type of use allowed by the permit or its equivalent
usagesDescription: Additional information about the specified uses covered by the permit or its equivalent or use restrictions
permitFiles: Copy of permit or its equivalent, or other relevant open-access document
permitDescription: Short description of the attached documentation
relevantDocuments: Other relevant website addresses and/or attached documents
infoUtilization: Information on the utilization of the genetic resource(s)
